FuncDef: Optional command that should only be used if a TWAMP Client is used to establish a TCP connection and communicate the test parameters to a TWAMP Server over TWAMP TCP Control and the test is launched from OAM-PM (Session-Sender). This command should not be used when the reflection point is a TWAMP Light reflector that does not require TCP TWAMP Control. When this command is included, the source UDP range is restricted. When this command is omitted, the source UDP port is dynamically allocated by the system.

ParaDef.Info: The UDP source port. Values-64374 to 64383.
